DOC.brief_summary: This phase II study is designed to demonstrate the ability of LFB-R593 to effectively eliminate exogenously-administered RhD-positive red blood cells from the circulation of an RhD-negative individual, thereby preventing RhD-alloimmunisation.
DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Study of LFB-R593, A Monoclonal Anti-RhD Antibody, in Healthy RhD Negative Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy RhDnegative volunteers Males and definitively sterile females No prior sensitization to RhD antigen Healthy RhDpositive volunteers
